name: Swinging It
description:
∘  °  ∘  °  ∘  °  ∘  °  ∘  °  ∘  °  ∘  °  ∘  °  ∘

An assignment where I needed to make a game involving Trigonometry! 

If you can't see the full canvas on your page, I recommend either playing in fullscreen or zooming out the page until you can!

∘  °  ∘  °  ∘  °  ∘  °  ∘  °  ∘  °  ∘  °  ∘  °  ∘

Click down anywhere on the canvas to have the ball anchor to that point and swing!

Every time the ball touches the goal, your score increases. 

Watch out though because 5 misses and your score is reset back to 0!

∘  °  ∘  °  ∘  °  ∘  °  ∘  °  ∘  °  ∘  °  ∘  °  ∘
